function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The high level of uncertainty and unreliability in the availability of unskilled work within the communities","Impact":"Difficulty in offering consistent and high-quality service at the Nomad lodges","Mitigation":"Implementing training programs to improve skills within the community, and creating contingency plans for workforce availability","Technologies":"Training and skill development programs, workforce management software for contingency planning","People":"Community members, visitors to the Nomad lodges","Owner":"Nomad lodges project team"},{"Description":"Social activities such as Mingas can lead to postponement of work and affect the rhythm of community life","Impact":"Disruption of work schedules and potential inconsistency in service delivery at Nomad lodges","Mitigation":"Engaging with community leaders to coordinate Mingas schedules, and developing flexible work arrangements to accommodate community activities","Technologies":"Community scheduling tools, remote work software for flexible arrangements","People":"Community members, Nomad lodges staff","Owner":"Nomad lodges project team"},{"Description":"Proximity to Amacayacu National Park and rich biodiversity may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to visitors and community members","Mitigation":"Implementing rigorous health and safety protocols, providing vaccinations for staff and visitors, and conducting regular health screenings","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, vaccination tracking software, remote health screening tools","People":"Visitors, community members, Nomad lodges staff","Owner":"Nomad lodges project team"}]}
